name: 5-in-1 Carbon Monoxide Detectors, Natural Gas Leak Detector, Plug-in & Battery Backup Co Detector, HD Digital Display, CO Gas Temp Humidity Sensor, 1-Pcs, Black
short_description: 5-in-1 Detectors - Real-time monitoring of carbon monoxide(PPM), combustible gas (%LEL), temperature(°F), humidity(RH%) and Backup Battery.
Easy Installation - Plug and play. Need to remove the screen protector.
9V battery backup provides protection during a power outage.
An alarm of 85 decibels (adjustable) will sound.
We provide unconditional return and exchange within 1 year.

name: 4-in-1 Natural Gas Leak Detector & Carbon Monoxide Detectors - Carbon Monoxide Detectors Plug in - Natural, Propane, Co & Gas Detector, Temperature & Humidity Detectors for Home, RV (White)
short_description: ABS
ABS

Upgraded 4-in-1 Detector: This advanced Natural Gas and Carbon Monoxide Detector combines sensors for natural gas, carbon monoxide, temperature, and humidity. Featuring robust performance, dual sensors, a dual alarm system, and fast response, it offers all-around protection to ensure the safety of your household.

Quick Response & Dual Alert System: This RV carbon monoxide detector is equipped with both visual and audible alarms. When gas levels become dangerous (CO ≥ 150 PPM, natural gas ≥ 5% LEL), the red light flashes repeatedly, accompanied by a loud alarm (≥ 85 dB). This immediate notification enables you and your family to quickly detect threats, providing essential protection for your safety.

Eco-Friendly & Energy-Efficient Design: This plug-in carbon monoxide detector is compatible with AC 110V~220V and operates with a low standby power consumption of ≤ 2W, making it highly energy-efficient. Its durable electronic sensor has a long lifespan, reducing the need for frequent replacements and offering an environmentally friendly solution.

LCD Display & Versatile Use: This RV carbon monoxide and propane detector features a clear LCD color screen, displaying precise readings for carbon monoxide (0-2000 PPM) and natural gas (0-10% LEL) levels. Its compact size saves space, making it ideal for various settings such as homes, hotels, RVs, and cruise ships.

Important Usage Notes: Before using, please remove the protective film. After plugging in, allow 180 seconds for the detector to adjust to its environment. Press the self-test button to trigger the alarm. Additionally, as the device may generate heat after powering on, wait 30 minutes for more accurate humidity and temperature readings.
product_description: 4-in-1 Natural Gas Leak Detector & Carbon Monoxide Detectors - Carbon Monoxide Detectors Plug in - Natural, Propane, Co & Gas Detector, Temperature & Humidity Detectors for Home, RV (White)

name: Carbon Monoxide Detector Plug in, Carbon Monoxide Detector Plug in Wall with Temp Humidity, Alarm Function with Clear LCD Display CO Detector for Home Kitchen RV Travel, 1 Pack
short_description: Plug-in carbon monoxide comprehensive detector: The plug-in carbon monoxide comprehensive detector clearly displays the changes in temperature, humidity, and carbon monoxide concentration in the home. The installation location is not restricted. The plug-and-play design is more convenient to use and supports the US standard 110V-220V AC power socket.

Easy to use: Equipped with advanced temperature, humidity and carbon monoxide sensors, the product does not require any operation. Just plug in the power supply to use it normally. The button can switch the temperature and humidity, screen brightness, switch buzzer and other functions.

Alarm function: We have upgraded the alarm function. When the concentration exceeds 50PPM, the product will quickly issue an alarm sound of more than 85dB to remind you that there is carbon monoxide gas in the surrounding environment and you need to open the window for ventilation in time.

3-speed brightness adjustment design: You can press the brightness adjustment button to adjust the brightness. When you choose to turn off the screen brightness, the indicator light on the screen will flash every 30 seconds to remind you that the product continues to detect the surrounding air quality. Please note: The screen indicator light will only flash when the screen brightness is turned off.

Self-test function: The carbon monoxide concentration is usually displayed as 000PPM. If you want to regularly check whether the product is working properly, you can press the "O" button to perform a self-test. When the product enters the self-test step, short press the "O" button to make a "beep" sound, then the green light flashes 3 times, and the red light flashes 3 times, indicating that the product is working properly and the self-test step is over.

name: Carbon Monoxide Detector, Carbon Monoxide Alarm, CO Detector with LCD Digital Display, Battery Powered, Two Packs
short_description: Carbon Monoxide Detection: Carbon monoxide alarm is capable of detecting indoor carbon monoxide gas concentration. Carbon monoxide is a gas that is hard for the nose to detect and can be harmful and even fatal.The carbon monoxide alarm promptly emits an alert, reminding individuals to take immediate action.

The carbon monoxide alarm utilizes sensitive sensor technology, enabling it to detect low concentrations of 50ppm of carbon monoxide. This high sensitivity ensures the alarm can detect potential hazards early on, providing enhanced safety.

Audible and Visual Alarm: When carbon monoxide or smoke is detected, the alarm emits a loud 85-decibel audible alarm sound and flashes a warning light simultaneously, attracting attention and reminding individuals to take urgent measures.
LCD Display: Carbon monoxide and smoke alarm is equipped with an LCD display, presenting the current carbon monoxide concentration, providing clear and intuitive information.
Battery Powered: The carbon monoxide alarm operates on battery power, ensuring it remains functional even during power outages, offering continuous protection for homes.
Easy Installation: Our alarm features a wireless design and can be effortlessly installed on any wall or ceiling using the included mounting bracket, screws, and anchors.

name: Kidde Carbon Monoxide Detector, Battery Powered CO Alarm with LEDs, Test-Reset Button, Low Battery Indicator, Portable
short_description: Electrochemical sensor technology detects CO gas
Easy installation, no wiring needed, detects during a power failure by operating on 2-AA batteries (included); Install on a wall of your home or place on a tabletop
Green LED indicates power to the carbon monoxide detector, while an 85-decibel alarm & a red LED indicates the presence of carbon monoxide
Event Memory records the last time carbon monoxide was detected or when the unit was last tested
product_description: The Kidde Carbon Monoxide Detector, Battery Powered CO Alarm with LEDs, Test-Reset Button, Low Battery Indicator, Portable, model 9CO5LP2, is a carbon monoxide detector that uses electrochemical sensor technology to detect carbon monoxide. The CO detector is powered by 2-AA alkaline batteries located in the back of the unit, providing easy installation & no wiring, plus coverage during a power failure. The alarm is conveniently designed and portable enough for travel - simply install it on a wall or place it on a tabletop. When carbon monoxide is detected, an 85-decibel alarm will sound & a red LED will flash. A green LED indicates that the alarm is receiving power. The test-hush button allows you to test the battery operations as well as temporarily silence the low battery chirp warning. Install a smoke detector & carbon monoxide detector on every level of your home and near bedrooms to help keep your family safe from fire & poisonous gas. UL Certified with a 10-year limited manufacturer's warranty.

name: 2 Pack Carbon Monoxide Detectors,CO Detectors Battery Powered,Carbon Monoxide CO Alarms with Light&Digital Display for Home,Bedroom,Kitchen,Office
short_description: High Sensitivity and Rapid Response: Equipped with an advanced Carbon Monoxide Detector Chip and electrochemical sensor, our CO Gas Monitor Alarm quickly detects odorless, invisible, and deadly carbon monoxide in the air.Respond quickly to protect your life.

Easy Installation: Our YTBASE carbon monoxide detector provides continuous monitoring of CO levels, ensuring the safety of your family. No need for wiring, just insert 2 AA batteries (not included) and it's ready to detect, even during power failures.

Multiple Alarm Standards: Be alerted at different levels of carbon monoxide concentration. 50ppm sounds an alarm within 60 to 90 minutes, 100ppm sounds an alarm within 10 to 40 minutes, and 300ppm sounds an alarm within 3 minutes. Stay informed and take prompt action.

Simple to Use: Featuring a single test/reset button, our CO detector is user-friendly. When dangerous CO levels are detected, the red light flashes and a loud 85-decibel alarm sounds, ensuring the safety of your loved ones and property.

Wide Application: Suitable for various environments where carbon monoxide may be present, such as your home kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, hotel, or during outdoor activities like barbecuing or in parking garages. Stay protected wherever you are.

name: Klein Tools ET110 CO Meter, Carbon Monoxide Tester and Detector with Exposure Limit Alarm, 4 x AAA Batteries and Carry Pouch Included
short_description: ACCURATE CO GAS MEASUREMENT: Detect and measure carbon monoxide gas levels with precision using our easy-to-use CO meter
PORTABLE AND PROTECTIVE: Carry our CO detector anywhere for user safety, with a built-in short-term exposure limit (STEL) alarm
DUAL ALARM SYSTEM: Stay informed about CO levels with both low (35 ppm) and high (200 ppm) level alarms, ensuring prompt action
AUDIBLE AND VISUAL ALERTS: Receive immediate warnings through audible and visual alarms, providing increased safety and peace of mind
CLEAR DISPLAY: Backlit display shows CO measurements (0 to 1000 ppm) and temperature (Fahrenheit and Celsius) for easy reading
BATTERY SAVING FEATURE: Auto-power off after 20 minutes of inactivity helps conserve battery life, extending the device's usability
CONVENIENT PACKAGE: Includes a carrying pouch and 4xAAA batteries, making it easy to transport and operate the CO meter efficiently
product_description: The ET110 CO Detector is an easy-to-use meter that detects and measures concentration levels of carbon monoxide (ppm) and temperature (Fahrenheit/Celsius), making it the perfect choice for HVAC professionals. Features backlit LCD screen, warning indicator light, audible and visual alarms and multiple function buttons. Includes carrying pouch and 4 x AAA batteries. For more than 160 years, Klein Tools has manufactured premium-quality, professional-grade hand tools that deliver the performance, durability and precision needed to get the job done right. Our family of engineers, workers and craftsman continue to put six generations of expertise into every tool we create by using only the highest quality materials, superior workmanship, and keeping manufacturing as close to home as we can. Klein isn't just the name of our company, it's also our family name. And since we're an American company that's family-owned and family-run, you know you can count on us to be here tomorrow. Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day ... Since 1857.

name: First Alert CO710 Carbon Monoxide Detector with 10-Year Battery and Digital Temperature Display , White
short_description: Keep your family safe with this easy to use digital-display, 10-year battery operated carbon monoxide alarm; Battery powered alarms provide continuous monitoring of CO levels, even if there's a power failure
Easy-to-read backlit digital display shows temperature and CO concentration; Peak Level feature displays the highest concentration of carbon monoxide measured
Built-in 10-year lithium battery offers continuous protection for the life of the carbon monoxide detector
A loud 85-decibel alarm sounds when CO levels reach dangerous levels
10-year limited warranty; Equipped with end-of-life signal chirp, so you know when it’s time to replace the unit for safety
All first alert CO alarms are rigorously tested to meet UL standards
First Alert has been the most trusted brand in home safety since launching the first residential smoke alarm in 1958 (Based on a First Alert Brand Trust Survey in February 2018)
First Alert warranty extends ten years from the date of purchase with proof of the original sales receipt and the product should be free from defect in material and workmanship
product_description: The First Alert CO710 Carbon Monoxide Alarm with 10-Year Battery and Digital Temperature Display detects dangerous carbon monoxide for up to 10 years. This carbon monoxide detector uses an electrochemical carbon monoxide sensor, the most accurate CO detection technology available, to detect the CO you can't see, smell, or taste in the air. A built-in 10-year lithium battery means you never need to worry about changing batteries during the lifetime of the alarm. This stylish CO monitor is designed to sit on top of a dresser or tabletop, and it has a backlit digital display that clearly shows the ambient temperature, as well as current and peak CO concentrations. An 85-decibel horn sounds if carbon monoxide levels are too high, and a test/silence button silences the alarm and allows you to test its functionality.

name: Kidde Hardwired Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, AA Battery Backup Smoke Alarm, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators, 2 Pack
short_description: 2-IN-1 DETECTION: Alerts you to both smoke & carbon monoxide (CO) using a single, cost-effective detector.
HARDWIRED & 2 AA BATTERY BACKUP (Included): Operates on 120V AC wiring (installed in the ceiling) with 2 AA alkaline batteries that provide battery backup coverage during power outages.

ENHANCED SENSING TECHNOLOGY: Reduces false smoke alarms often caused by cooking. Comprehensively tested to meet the latest UL standards, meets UL 217 9th Edition, UL 2034 4th Edition, & FCC standards.
INTERCONNECT CAPABILITY: When one alarm sounds, they all sound, so you can get out faster. (Different models offer different interconnection options and requirements. See User Guide for more info.)
SELF-TESTING ALARM: Internal components ensure alarm is always operating as expected. Not a substitute for a manual push test, perform a button test once per week to verify alarm operation.
3 LED NOTIFICATIONS: LED lights indicate alarm status, green = normal operation, amber = operating error, red = smoke or carbon monoxide detected & a loud 85-decibel alarm will sound.
TEST & HUSH BUTTON: Makes it easy to test the 5-inch combination detector and silence false alarms, should they occur.
10-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: Warranty begins when the alarm is powered on. If that date is unknown, it should be assumed that alarms should be replaced.
product_description: Experience the next level of fire safety with the Kidde Hardwired Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Detector, AA Battery Backup, Interconnectable, LED Warning Light Indicators, 2 Pack, model 30CUAR. This smoke & CO detector has enhanced sensing technology that reduces false alarms often caused by cooking and sends fast alerts that help give your family more time to get out safely. To detect carbon monoxide, an electrochemical sensor is used. This alarm offers a modern 5-inch design ideal for all living spaces such as living rooms, hallways, kitchens, & bedrooms. Comprehensively tested and designed to the latest UL standard for safety and reliability, the 5-inch smoke & CO alarm is powered by 120V AC wiring with 2 AA alkaline replaceable backup batteries (included) for continual detection even during outages. Batteries should be replaced every 6 months or when the alarm sounds a low battery chirp. In addition, it’s self-testing and easy to install with the included twist-and-click mounting bracket. This Kidde combination alarm is equipped with end-of-life notifications that will beep to remind you it’s time to replace it at the of its 10-year lifespan. Meets requirements of 9th Edition UL 217, UL 2034 4th Edition, FCC, and CSFM.
